00025 #ifndef EVENTSPACE_H
00026 #define EVENTSPACE_H
00027 
00028 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00029 #include "config.h"
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 #include <utility>
00035 
00036 #include <boost/utility.hpp>
00037 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00038 
00039 #include "itemmap.hpp"
00040 
00041 namespace maxent {
00042 using namespace std;
00043 
00044 // this class is responsible to free memory allocated for context on destory
00045 // it's noncopyable, so can only has one instance.  When deleting elements
00046 // from this vector, the caller is responsible to free those elements. Anyway
00047 // it can be used in boost::shared_ptr<>.
00048 template<typename Ev>
00049 class EventSpace : public std::vector<Ev>, public boost::noncopyable {
00050     public:
00051         typedef ItemMap<std::string> featmap_type;
00052         typedef ItemMap<std::string> outcomemap_type;
00053         typedef std::vector<pair<std::string, float> > context_type;
00054 
00055         EventSpace(boost::shared_ptr<featmap_type> featmap =
00056                 boost::shared_ptr<featmap_type>(), 
00057                 boost::shared_ptr<outcomemap_type> outcomemap =
00058                 boost::shared_ptr<outcomemap_type>()
00059                 );
00060 
00061         virtual ~EventSpace();
00062 
00063         void add_event(const context_type& context, size_t count = 1,
00064                 const std::string& outcome = "", double prior = 1.0);
00065 
00066         void add_event(const context_type& context, size_t count = 1,
00067                 double prior = 1.0) { add_event(context, count, "", prior);}
00068 
00069         void set_newfeat_mode(bool f) { m_newfeat_mode = f; }
00070 
00071         bool newfeat_mode() const { return m_newfeat_mode; }
00072 
00073         void merge_events(size_t cutoff);
00074 
00075         boost::shared_ptr<featmap_type> feat_map() {
00076             return m_feat_map;
00077         }
00078 
00079         boost::shared_ptr<outcomemap_type> outcome_map() {
00080             return m_outcome_map;
00081         }
00082 
00083     private:
00084         struct cutoffed_event {
00085             cutoffed_event(size_t cutoff):m_cutoff(cutoff) {}
00086             bool operator()(const Ev& ev) const {
00087                 return ev.m_count < m_cutoff;
00088             }
00089             size_t m_cutoff;
00090         };
00091         boost::shared_ptr<featmap_type> m_feat_map;
00092         boost::shared_ptr<outcomemap_type> m_outcome_map;
00093         bool m_newfeat_mode;  // whether new feature can be added
00094 };
00095 
00096 } // namespace maxent
00097 
00098 #include "eventspace.tcc"
00099 #endif /* ifndef EVENTSPACE_H */
